#### The following are some test strings for the compiler and parser.
#### Un-comment only one example at a time.
######################################################################


the dog loves the cat .

# the dog chases the slow , lazy cat up a tall tree and the rat loves the dog .

# a lazy dog quickly chases the fast , sneaky , furry cat up a tall tree and the rat loves the dog .

### Example with a syntax error.
# the dog the cat .


## Multi-line example.
# the lazy dog quickly 
#         chases the fast , sneaky , furry cat 
#             up a tall tree 
#         and the 
# rat loves the dog .
